title: Eligible Religious structure/Eligible onsite amenities/Eligible any other non-residential structure shall be given existing carpet area or as decided by the Government
clause_text: Eligible Religious structure/Eligible onsite amenities/Eligible any other non-residential structure shall be given existing carpet area or as decided by the Government. Each eligible slum dweller shall be entailed to a tenement of carpet area of 25 sq. m (269 sq.ft.) The total permissible FSI for an Urban Renewal Scheme shall be
